body_html: You can generate a LSTM cell indidivually and manually loop back state (i.e. don't use static_rnn or dynamic_rnn). It will convert the lstm as individual operators. For more help, please provide a simple example that you are trying to run.
body_text: You can generate a LSTM cell indidivually and manually loop back state (i.e. don't use static_rnn or dynamic_rnn). It will convert the lstm as individual operators. For more help, please provide a simple example that you are trying to run.
body: You can generate a LSTM cell indidivually and manually loop back state (i.e. don't use static_rnn or dynamic_rnn). It will convert the lstm as individual operators. For more help, please provide a simple example that you are trying to run.
